sentences.en: Heteromorphic data integrity contains three steps: data preparation, data mapping and data combination.
sentences.cn: 异构数据集成包括三个步骤: 数据准备, 数据匹配和数据合并.

sentences.en: In most heteromorphic plants the stigmas of the different morphs have different surface textures and the pollen may be of different size or sculpturing or both.
sentences.cn: 在大多数异态型植物中．不同形态的柱头的表面结构不同，花粉的大小或纹饰不同，或两者兼而有之。

words.tran_cn: [生物]异形的，异态的；[化学]多晶型的

trans.tran_en: differing from the normal form in size, shape, and function
